Class ConnectionServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.resist.websocket.ConnectionServer

extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ConnectionServer(java.lang.String address, int port, java.lang.String path, java.util.logging.Logger log)
      Creates a new WebSocket server.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getAddress()
      Returns the address of the server.
      java.util.logging.Logger getLogger()
      Returns the logger used by the server.
      java.lang.String getPath()
      Returns the path of the server.
      int getPort()
      Returns the port of the server.
      protected void handleControlFrame(Message message)
      Handles a control frame, running it in a new thread.
      protected void handleMessage(Message message)
      Handles a completed message, running it in a new thread.
      void manageConnections()
      Listens for new connections and starts new threads.
      ConnectionServer setControlFrameHandler(MessageHandler controlFrameHandler)
      Sets a handler to call when the client sends a control frame.
      ConnectionServer setMessageHandler(MessageHandler messageHandler)
      Sets a handler to call when the client sends a completed message
      ConnectionServer setTimeout(int timeout)
      Sets the read timeout to be used for connections.
      void stop()
      Stops the server from accepting new connections.
